{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = TP-Link-TL6060 2-1.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = AX6000 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_1622.html |ppalt = (CN) |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_TL-XDR6060 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-XDR6060 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX60002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7AX6000 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2050501464 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4908; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;F59L2G81A-25T; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = ESMT;M15T4G16256A-DEB; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8211FS; |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM54991E;BCM54991EB0KFSBG; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = B0:BE:76 |oui = B0:BE:76
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 (Type A), USB 3.0 (Type C), SFP |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sfp_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, 1024QAM, VHT160, HE160, MU-MIMO |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN HP FEM;Qorvo;QPF4216;;4; ,,, 5GHz WLAN HP FEM;Qorvo;QPF4516;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = http://tplinkwifi.net |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = TP-Link_XXXX, TP-Link_XXXX_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BCM43684KRFBG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad1ax = 4804 |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1733 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 58 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BCM43684KRFBG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad2ax = 1148 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *802.11ax 4T4R WLAN (AX6000) *2x 1GbE/2.5GbE WAN/LAN ports *3x 1GbE LAN ports; 1x SFP port *2x USB 3.0 (Type A/C) ports
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.tp-link.com/ro/news-details-18054.html ''TP-LINK Archer AX6000 and AX11000 Routers Series'' on '''TP-LINK'''] (RO) *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/13697/tplink-announces-archer-ax6000-and-ax11000-wifi-6-80211ax-routers ''TP-LINK Archer AX6000 and AX11000 Wi-Fi 6 Routers'' on '''AnandTech''']
===Reviews=== *[https://www.acwifi.net/9412.html ''TP-LINK XDR6060 Gigabit Router'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) *[https://www.acwifi.net/9538.html ''TP-LINK XDR6060 Router Teardown'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN)
==See also== :;[[TP-LINK]] • [[TP-LINK Archer AX series]] • [[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[TP-LINK Archer AX1500]] - AX1500 Wi-Fi 6 Router :[[TP-LINK Archer AX10]] • FCC ID: TE7AX10 (2019-07-26) *[[TP-LINK Archer AX1800]] - AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 Router :[[TP-LINK Archer AX20]] • FCC ID: TE7AX20 (2019-11-07) *[[TP-LINK Archer AX3000]] - AX3000 Gigabit Wi-Fi 6 Router :[[TP-LINK Archer AX50]] • FCC ID: TE7AX50 (2019-06-19) *[[TP-LINK Archer AX6000]] - AX6000 Next-Gen Wi-Fi 6 Router :FCC ID: TE7AX6000 (2018-12-10) *[[TP-LINK Archer AX11000]] - AX11000 Tri-Band Gaming Router :FCC ID: TE7AX11000 (2018-12-19)
